name: Castaway
description:
Welcome to our Ludum Dare 38 submission!

You guys are little castaway creatures lost in a remote island in the middle of nowhere. Try to survive collecting resources... seems there is some coconuts, a "natural" water fountain and look! even a burguer orchard!

Feel free to vote and leave your feedback at:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/castaway
